title: Scatterheart
description: Once upon a time, there was a girl called Scatterheart, who was selfish and vain, with a heart as fickle as the changing winds...Hanna Cheshire is rich and spoilt. She has servants to wait on her hand and foot â€” and Thomas, a passionate young tutor who fills her head with stories.Then one day her father disappears, and she is left to fend for herself. Alone and penniless, she is sentenced to transportation for a crime she didn't commit.Once Hannah considered Thomas beneath her: a servant, a commoner. Now she thinks of him more and more. But will she ever see him again?
author: Lili Wilkinson
